root.name: Trust and Betrayal: The Legacy of Siboot
root.description: Groundbreaking if overlooked game by Chris Crawford. Players take the role of one of the potential leaders of a stranded tribe of aliens, and must gather information on how to defeat their competitors for the role of the people's new leader. Uses what Crawford called the "Inverse Parser" system, which intelligently narrowed down parser choices instead of the blind-typing parsers that are still in use today. This innovative design has yet to be imitated, but could revolutionize human/AI interactions.
